actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Civil and Constitutional Rights.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Civil and Constitutional Rights

official_title: A bill to amend title 28 of the United States Code to authorize the collection of fees for the processing of certain requests for identification records, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the Attorney General to establish and collect fees for the processing of requests for identification records. Authorizes the Attorney General to exchange identification records with federally chartered or insured banks and, if authorized by State statute, with State and local government officials for purposes of employment and licensing. Authorizes appropriations to carry out this Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 28 of the United States Code to authorize the collection of fees for the processing of certain requests for identification records, and for other purposes.
